ARABIC: وَلَقَدْ ءَاتَيْنَا مُوسَى ٱلْهُدَىٰ وَأَوْرَثْنَا بَنِىٓ إِسْرَٰٓءِيلَ ٱلْكِتَٰبَ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: We gave Musa the guidance and bequeathed the Book to the tribe of Israel,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: Verily We showed Moses the way, and bequeathed the Book to the children of Israel,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: We surely guided Moses and made the Children of Israel the heirs of the Book
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: To Moses We had given guidance and to the children of Israel We had given the Book
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: And indeed We gave Moosa the guidance, and bequeathed the Book to the Descendants of Israel.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: And, indeed We gave Musa the guidance, and We caused the Children of Israel to inherit the Scripture --
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And certainly We gave Musa the guidance, and We made the children of Israel inherit the Book,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: We also gave Moses the guidance, and We bequeathed upon the Children of Israel the Book
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: And We verily gave Moses the guidance, and We caused the Children of Israel to inherit the Scripture,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: We gave Moses Our guidance, and made the Children of Israel the inheritors of the Book --
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And assuredly We vouchsafed Unto Musa the guidance, and We caused the Children of Isra'il to inherit the Book.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: Certainly We gave guidance to Moses and We gave the Children of Israel the Book as a legacy,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: We did aforetime give Moses the (Book of) Guidance, and We gave the book in inheritance to the Children of Israel,-
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: And, indeed We gave Musa (Moses) the guidance, and We caused the Children of Israel to inherit the Scripture [i.e. the Taurat (Torah)],
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: We gave Moses the Guidance and bequeathed upon the Children of Israel the Book
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: We gave Moses guidance, and made the Children of Israel inherit the Scripture.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And We had certainly given Moses guidance, and We caused the Children of Israel to inherit the Scripture
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [40:53] And verily We gave Moses the guidance, the Torah and miracles, and We made the Children of Israel, after Moses, heirs to the scripture, the Torah,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (And we verily gave Moses the guidance) i.e. the Torah and We gave David the Psalms and Jesus the son of Mary the Gospel, (and We caused the Children of Israel to inherit the Scripture) and We revealed to the Children of Israel after them the Scripture of David and Jesus,
